p: Typical poultry diets are commonly enriched by feed additives containing vitamins and minerals to support rapid growth and a favorable feed conversion ratio, and nanosized feed additives characterized by a high surface area to volume ratio and high absorption in the body could be incorporated in vaccines and nutrient supplements and directly transported to targeted organs or systems without degradation resulting in health benefits. Current state of NPs use as poultry feed supplements was reviewed by Gangadoo et al. [ 271].
